UPDATE manage_account SET cashBalance = cashBalance + freezeD1, freezeBalance = freezeBalance - freezeD1, freezeD1 = 0
, cashBalance = cashBalance + freezeT1 , freezeBalance = freezeBalance - freezeT1, freezeT1 = 0
